metadata.name: HackTool - Rubeus Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the hacktool Rubeus via PE information of command line parameters

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rubeus.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rubeus.exe') AND lower(device.desc) = lower('rubeus') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('asreproast ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dump /service:krbtgt ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dump /luid:0x')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('kerberoast ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('createnetonly /program:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ptt /ticket:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/impersonateuser:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('renew /ticket:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('asktgt /user:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('harvest /interval:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('s4u /user:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('s4u /ticket:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hash /password:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('golden /aes256:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('silver /user:'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the hacktool Rubeus via PE information of command line parameters
